category-def.name: ac.soton.updateSite.umlb
category-def.label: UML-B
category-def.description: Extensions to the Event-B modelling notation to support UML-like diagrams

category-def.name: ac.soton.updateSite.coda
category-def.label: CODA
category-def.description: Extensions to the Event-B modelling notation to support component diagrams

category-def.name: ac.soton.updateSite.camillex
category-def.label: CamilleX
category-def.description: Support textual source files for Event-B models

category-def.name: ac.soton.updateSite.framework
category-def.label: Frameworks
category-def.description: Supporting frameworks that are usually installed as part of other features.

category-def.name: ac.soton.updateSite.developers
category-def.label: SoftwareDevelopersKit
category-def.description: USERS SHOULD NOT INSTALL THESE. SDK versions for software developers. These features contain source code and unit tests that are needed to develop plug-ins.
